events.message: The insured has filed a claim reporting a car collision that occurred on April 30, 2024, at the intersection of Main Street and 5th Avenue.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision causing damage.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to the case to provide assistance and gather additional details from the customer.
The insured was notified that their claim has been acknowledged and the investigation process would start shortly.
The insurance company requested photos of the damaged vehicle and the police report related to the accident.
The insured submitted all requested documents including detailed photos and the official police accident report on time.
The claim investigation commenced with an agent inspecting the damages and verifying the accuracy of the submitted evidence.
The investigation was completed, confirming the extent of the damage and validating the cause as an auto collision.
A settlement was proposed to cover repair costs and rental car expenses while the vehicle is being fixed.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement offer and appreciated the communication during the process.
The insurance claim was officially approved based on the investigation findings and customer agreement on the settlement.
Payment covering the approved claim amount was processed and issued to the insuredâ€™s bank account.
The claim was successfully closed after confirmation that all repairs were completed and payment received.
